text: Christopher Wilson (May 16, 1978 â€“ January 24, 2020) was an American professional wrestler better known by his ring name, Justice Pain. Pain was best known for his time in Combat Zone Wrestling, as well as Xtreme Pro Wrestling and Pro Wrestling Unplugged. He had many titles in his CZW career and was the real life brother of CZW wrestler and former tag team partner Nick Gage. Pain died in Yonkers, New York on January 24, 2020 at the age of 41.Chris Wilson AKA Justice Pain Passed Away At Age 41 ==References== ==Other websites== * Online World of Wrestling profile Category:American professional wrestlers Category:2020 deaths Category:1978 births
title: Justice Pain
